column3: It became very clear to me that Yooralla was not as interested in media coverage that explored issues faced by people with disability as it was in giving a pat on the back to journalists who maintained the status quo by giving readers the warm and fuzzies over their morning paper.

When I was a kid, 'Land of the Lost' was my favorite show, just because it was - in the landscape of Saturday morning cartoons - it was so unique. It was a live-action show and kids were in it, these creatures, these Sleestaks and dinosaurs. Every week was a different adventure. I couldn't wait. I loved it so much.
I love the smell of juice boxes in the morning.
I had a monumental idea this morning, but I didn't like it.

Let me tell you, it is still morning in America. It just happens to be kind of a head pounding, hung over for four hours in America - and it's shaping up to be a nasty day, but its still morning in America.
I wake up laughing. Yes, I wake up in the morning and there I am just laughing my head off.
Every morning I get up and look through the Forbes list of the richest people in America. If I'm not there, I go to work.
You feel a little older in the morning. By noon I feel about 55.
When I wake up in the morning, I feel like a billionaire without paying taxes.
The most efficient way to live reasonably is every morning to make a plan of one's day and every night to examine the results obtained.
It is not time for mirth and laughter, the cold, gray dawn of the morning after.
Tell him he can have my title, but I want it back in the morning.
